commit message: Move source to app folder. Create empty AMSecrets.java if it does not exist.

Fix the indent of build.gradle
Remove ormlite optimization for simpler code.

Fix QuizLauncher dialog size issue
Fix animation bug that the fragment background disappears during animation
Remove the scaling animation to make the animation more smooth
Change to use new color picker
Update empty db and defualt db to the new version
Bump version
Use Ink-android library for drawing. Deprecating old FinterPaint.
Put device to immersive mode when full screen option is enabled
Small parameter visibility change
Update README.md
Add Card Player to the action list
Make the three button style as the default button style.
Add anchor to file browser layout
Do not truncate for the 'Number of cards scheduled in a day' statistics
Bump version
Revert accidentally change statistics range to 31.
Start accumulative statistics from day 1 instead of day 0
Enable downgrading database.
Update gradle plugin to 2.0. Update support libraries
Fix file browser crash issue due to anchor setting
Add English (AU) to the TTS language.
File browser behavior
Update gradle and gradle plugin version
Update Android support library
